channel.title: 317 server+client suggestions
channel.description:
im rewriting this shit bc my comp is retarded .... im looking for a 317 that has 474 gfx and gameframes and everything else... wat im planning on doing is leeching a source/client and making it into a new game..wont be rs at all but itll still have the rs combat/looks
GIVE ME SUGGESTIONS AND PROB IDEAS ON HOW IMA PULL THIS OFF ....or u can help me with my current client/server im using impozzes source andpvpscapez client...i cantg find the file to make me owner.... needlessly to say i dont plan on being finished before christmas

item.title: 317 server+client suggestions
item.dc:creator: @holylouis holylouis
item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

@the web guy
its gonna be a trail and error type deal i think lol yes ik its gonna take alot longer but in the end at least ill know wtf im doing XD

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server+client suggestions
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“holylouis, post:1, topic:462248”]im rewriting this shit bc my comp is retarded …
im looking for a 317 that has 474 gfx and gameframes and everything else…
wat im planning on doing is leeching a source/client and making it into a new game…wont be rs at all but itll still have the rs combat/looks

GIVE ME SUGGESTIONS AND PROB IDEAS ON HOW IMA PULL THIS OFF …or u can help me with my current client/server im using impozzes source andpvpscapez client…i cantg find the file to make me owner…
needlessly to say i dont plan on being finished before christmas[/quote]

You’re not going to be able to do this unless you know some about Java, and some about 3D modeling, or get someone to do it for you (If you’re completely going to change the look and what not), also some base knowledge about cache packaging, and other things. I support anyone that’s trying something they’ve never tried before, however, this really should have more information, a couple pictures, and than be posted in the Server Development section.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server+client suggestions
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

You’d have to make it recognise. Not that difficult. There are plenty of 317s in the downloads section which load higher revision graphics, just got to use your eyes

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server+client suggestions
item.dc:creator: @holylouis holylouis
item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

there is only 1 problem with that idea there anit no player rights in that file :((( idk if i should attempt to add it in there. my worry is if i did add it in there would it recognize the command to be owner

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server+client suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

Just a server that has everything would be nice, and all other servers will be out of date, but noone has put the time and effort to do this.

but back on topic, for a regular 317 to give yourself owner is in the character folder find your character name and change player rights to 3. and I am going to school for engineering, some of my classes where on java, but I wont know how to mess with the games inner core much.

if you are really serious about it i suggest to make a thread on development teams. and explain to people what your doing and what you need help with and i’m sure just as long as you have a good imagination you will have a few people wanting to help since it will be more unique then any other server since every bases there server off runescape or off player killing…

Good luck

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server+client suggestions
item.dc:creator: @holylouis holylouis
item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

when i started this project it was in like march of this yr i had a decent client/server had it all magled out to where i was owner and i was in the process of editing items/making new item when my laptop crashed and lost all my files …and this morning i remembered i started this and id love to finish this …no im not a pro coder/yes i do need to learn bout coding and java…i was using project fubergen i think it was when i started this project …
but itd would be nice to see something new from a rsps that u havent seen before. most of the rsps ive seen have been rs with modded items and such

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server+client suggestions
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

if you want something unique and something that isnt runescape (using runescape engine but updating it to look nothing like runescape)… but you cant even give yourself owner on a 317… then you have a few years til you accomplish this.

I suggest starting with reading about java.

Read full topic
